remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 、和 方法，您可以在集合中添加和移除单个控件。The , , and methods enable you to add and remove individual controls from the collection. 你还可以使用 或 方法在集合中添加或移除所有控件。You can also use the or methods to add or remove all the controls from the collection. 可以通过将控件传递到 方法来确定 是否是集合的成员。You can determine whether a is a member of the collection by passing the control into the method. 若要获取集合中 位置的索引值，请将该控件传递到 方法中。To get the index value of the location of a in the collection, pass the control into the method. 可以通过调用 方法将集合复制到数组中。The collection can be copied into an array by calling the method.
